Run Apps in the same process as the framework but lock down all network storage and DOM apis by polyfilling. Do the same thing for the UI frame.

Also during the event capturing phase make sure no link ever submits data or navigates to an external URL. Do the same thing for form submissions.

This gives the most flexibility to UI developers.

Add support for main frameworks so that direct dom access is gated (a core bundle for those frameworks would be pre-packaged by AIRport and lazy loaded would be provided by App Developers.

Initial support - Svelte.
